protein.specific_function: Weakly binds calcium but binds zinc very tightly- distinct binding sites with different affinities exist for both ions on each monomer. Physiological concentrations of potassium ion antagonize the binding of both divalent cations, especially affecting high-affinity calcium-binding sites

reference.reference_text: Engelkamp D, Schafer BW, Erne P, Heizmann CW: S100 alpha, CAPL, and CACY: molecular cloning and expression analysis of three calcium-binding proteins from human heart. Biochemistry. 1992 Oct 27;31(42):10258-64.
